style.color: function (feature, variable, glyph, track) {dicercall = feature.get('Predominant_size'); if(dicercall == 24) { return '#F26F6F'; } else if(dicercall == 23) { return '#1DADAD'; } else if(dicercall == 22) { return '#A2E063'; } else if(dicercall == 21) { return '#9669C9'; } else {return '#EBE53B';} }
style.label: Predominant_size

tracks.label: Araport11_smallRNA
tracks.category: Araport Data / Araport11 / Annotation (Jun 2016)

metadata.Description: Araport11 small RNA features from root (Hsieh et al., 2009; Breakfield et al., 2012), leaf (Yu et al., 2013), aerial part (Fahlgren et al., 2010), flower (Lister et al., 2008; Cuperus et al., 2010; Law et al., 2013), embryo (Lu et al., 2012), and silique (Hardcastle et al., 2012) (Supporting Table S2), including de novo small RNA clusters identified using ShortStack (Axtell, 2013)
